item.title: A Closer Look at 'Inside Job'
item.description: “Inside Job” is a 2010 documentary written, directed and produced by Charles Ferguson on the 2008 global financial crisis. It won the Oscar in the “Best Documentary Feature” category in 2011. Notwithstanding, it makes for an enlightening and thrilling watch that every citizen, who cares about where their hard earned money goes, should watch. This documentary is not an easy watch that one can grab on a lazy afternoon comfortable on their couch.
